abstract: In messages since Sept. 27, a Google user offered rewards for the killing of the Obama family, George W. Bush and several members of Congress.
snippet: In messages since Sept. 27, a Google user offered rewards for the killing of the Obama family, George W. Bush and several members of Congress.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. and the Capitol Police are investigating a series of online messages offering rewards for the murder of the Obama family, former President George W. Bush and more than a dozen Republican members of Congress. The posts also called for bombing bridges, buildings and monuments.

headline.main: Authorities Investigate E-Mail Threats Against Obamas and Others
